name: Vegetables
planting_time: All year round (depending on type), but usually early rainy season or with irrigation
spacing: Varies; e.g., 30 cm × 30 cm for leafy vegetables
fertilizer: Organic compost or NPK 15-15-15 at planting, plus top-dressing as needed
harvest: 1 to 3 months after planting, depending on type
notes: Requires regular watering, weeding, and pest monitoring.
